details: This is the file path/folder structure extracted upon upload, do not modify.
This is the file name extracted upon upload, do not modify.
This is the date last modified extracted upon upload, do not modify.
If the date last modified is not meaningful, please provide a meaningful date.
Provide a description which gives more context/meaning to the record, especially if the filename is not descriptive enough. Please do check these for spelling and grammar.
example: Draft business case for a Learning Resource Centre

details: Provide any reference which may have been used during the life of the record (it must not contain any line breaks). If you have multiple former references, these should be separated by semi-colons.
Closed records must have been approved by the Advisory Council. Only the words 'Open' or 'Closed' will be accepted. This is case sensitive and variations on these words will not be accepted.
Closed record: Must match date of the record (if provided) else date last modified, must also align to date provided on closure application.
Closed record: Provide a list of the number of years closure for each foi exemption code, in corresponding order.
format: Semi-colon separated list of numbers between 1 and 150 (with no spaces)

details: Closed record: Provide the FOI exemption codes used to justify closure for the record, as approved by the Advisory Council This should be the same as the code(s) on the closure schedule for the record.
Closed record: This date must match the one found on the closure schedule. It can be found on the bottom right hand corner of each page.
Closed record: Yes means the filename should also be closed.
Closed record: If the filename of this record is closed, please provide an alternate filename (without the file extension) to be displayed on Discovery while the record is closed.
Closed record: Yes means the description should also be closed.
Closed record: If the description of this record is closed, please provide an alternate description to be displayed on Discovery while the record is closed.

Indicate if the record is in English, Welsh or both (English;Welsh). This is case sensitive and variations on these words will not be accepted. If you have records in other languages, please contact your digital transfer advisor.
format:
Semi-colon separated list (with no spaces)
default: English

details: Provide a translation of the title (without the file extension)
Indicate the copyright holder for this record is ‘Crown copyright’, ‘Third party’ or both ‘Crown copyright;Third party’.
format: Semi-colon separated list (with no spaces) Default: ‘Crown copyright’

details: Can be used to include specific information about copyright conditions. Specific copyright holders should be in a list separated by semi-colons. Contact your digital transfer advisor for guidance if required.
Required to support a transfer of digital records for which paper copies of some records have already been transferred.
